Urdu: آج رات عشاء کی نماز کے بعد میں وآپس دکان کی طرف آرہاتھاکہ ایک آدمی نے جوکہ ایک گاڑی میں بیٹھاہواتھااس نے ہاتھـ اٹھایااورمجھے اپنی طرف متوجہ کیا۔
LDC_Translation_1: Tonight when I was coming back to the shop after prayers, a man sitting in a car raised his hand to call my attention.
LDC_Translation_2: Today after Isha prayer, while I was coming back towards the shop, a man, sitting in a car, signaled by raising his hand towards me to get my attention.
LDC_Translation_3: I was returning to the shop after Isha'a prayers tonight when a man who was sitting in a car lifted his hand and got my attention.
LDC_Translation_4: Today, after Isha prayers, when I was coming towards my shop, a man who was sitting in a vehicle raised his hand and summoned me.
Turk_Translation_1: When I was coming back to the shop after Isha prayer tonight, one man who was sitting in car, raised his hand and asked me to come.
Turk_Translation_2: I was coming back to my shop after the Isha prayer tonight, a man who was sitting in his car waved at me and called.
Turk_Translation_3: Today, as I was returning to my shop, after Isha prayer, when a man sitting in a car at the circle raised his hand and diverted my attention towards him.
Turk_Translation_4: Tonight after Ishan's namaz i was heading towards the shop on the way a person attracted my attention towards him.

Urdu: میں نے سوچاکہ شایدکے یہ آدمی راستہ بھول گیاہے یاکچھـ پوچھناچاہتاہے میں رک گیاتواسکی گاڑی میں اسکی پوری فیملی بیٹھی ہوئی تھی۔
LDC_Translation_1: I thought, maybe he's lost or wants to ask me something. I stopped and saw that his whole family was sitting in the car.
LDC_Translation_2: I thought perhaps this man has forgotten the way or wants to ask something; I stopped and saw his whole family sitting in the car.
LDC_Translation_3: I thought that the man might have lost the way or wanted to ask something. I stopped. He had his family in his car.
LDC_Translation_4: I thought this man has forgotten his way or wanted to ask something. I stopped, and when I looked into the car, his whole family was in it.
Turk_Translation_1: I thought may be this man has forgotten his way or may be he wants to ask something. I stopped so his whole family was in his car.
Turk_Translation_2: I thought that probable this man has lost his way or wants to ask something, I stopped as his whole family was sitting in the car.
Turk_Translation_3: I thought this man might have lost his way, or he might want to ask something, so I stopped, and his whole family was sitting in the car.
Turk_Translation_4: I thought this person has lost his way or wanted to ask something to me i stopped i saw his whole family along him.

Urdu: اس نے اپنامدعابیان کیاکہ میں عربی اچھی طرف سمجھـ سکتاہوں کہ نہیں میں نے کہاکہ کوئی مسئلہ نہیں ہےآپ بتاؤکہ کیابات ہے؟
LDC_Translation_1: He asked me if I could understand Arabic well or not. I said, "No problem, tell me what's the matter."
LDC_Translation_2: He asked whether I could fully understand Arabic; I said no problem tell me the issue.
LDC_Translation_3: He told his objective and said that he was not sure if he could understand Arabic well or not and I told him that it was not a problem and he should tell his story.
LDC_Translation_4: He asked me if I understand Arabic well. I said, no problem; tell me what is the matter.
Turk_Translation_1: He asked if I can understand Arabic very well or not. I said that there is no problem. You tell me what is the matter.
Turk_Translation_2: he asked me if I could speak and understand Arabic, I said no problem, you tell me what's up?
Turk_Translation_3: He asked whether I could understand Arabic well or not. I said no problem, tell me what you want.
Turk_Translation_4: He narrated his topic i fluently understand Arabic i told no problem tell me your problem?

Urdu: اس نے کہناشروع کیاکہ میں ریاض سے آیاہوں یہاں مدینہ میں لیکن کسی نے میری جیب کاٹ لی ہے آپ براہ مہربانی کوئی مدد کریں میں نے کہا کہ معاف کرو بھائی، کیونکہ ایساہی ایک واقع میرے ساتھـ پہلے ہوچکاہے کہ میں نے اس بندہ کوبیس ریال دئیے کہ اس سے پٹرول بھرا کرریاض چلے جاؤ لیکن اس نے تھوڑا ساآگے جاکرپھروہی کام شروع کردیا۔
LDC_Translation_1: He said, "I have come here to Madina from Riyaz, but someone has pick pocketed me. Please help me." I said, "Sorry brother, I've fallen for this trick before. I gave a guy twenty riyals to fill up with petrol to go to Riyaz, but he just went a little way down the road and started telling people the same story."
LDC_Translation_2: He started saying that I came from Riyadh to Medina and someone picked my pocket and so could you please help me; I said for him to excuse me because a similar incident had already happened to me when I gave 20 Riyals to a person to buy petrol with this money and get back to Riyadh, but he, after going a little distance, started doing the same thing.
LDC_Translation_3: He started to say that he had come from Riyadh but here in Madina, someone had picked his pocket and requested me to help him. I asked him to excuse me because I had already experienced such an incident where I gave a person 20 Riyals and asked him to get the petrol tank filled and go to Riyadh, but he started the same thing a little further on the way.
LDC_Translation_4: He started saying, "I came from Riyaz to Madinah but someone picked my pocket. Please help me." I asked for an excuse because one such incident had happened to me even earlier. I gave that man a note of 20 Riyals to get the gasoline to go back to Riyaz, but after going a little ahead he started to do it again.
Turk_Translation_1: He started saying, I have come from Riyadh but here some one in Medina picked my pocket if you please help me. I said forget about it.Because this has happened with me earlier also as I gave this man 20 riyals to pay for gas and go back to Riyadh but he started doing the same thing after moving forward a little.
Turk_Translation_2: he started telling that he has come from Riyadh and here in Medina someone picked my pocket, kindly help me. I said please go away brother, since such an incident has already taken place with me that I gave this man 12 riyals so that he could reach Riyadh, but he started doing the same after moving a little farther.
Turk_Translation_3: He started to say that I have come from Riyadh, to Madinah, but someone has pick-pocketed me, so please help me out. I asked him to excuse me, as such an incident had taken place with me previously, that I had given the person 20 Riyals to buy petrol to reach Riyadh, but he went a little ahead and started to ask somebody else.
Turk_Translation_4: He started narrating i came from Riyadh here in someone has pick pocketed me you kindly help me out i told i am sorry brother, because this kind of situation is also faced by me before i gave him 20 Rial and guided him to fill petrol and head back to Riyadh but he after moving a certain distance started the same business

Urdu: مجھے بڑا غصہ آیامیں نے اس کو بہت بولااورسپاہی کی دھمکی دی تووہ نودوگیارہ ہوگیا۔
LDC_Translation_1: I got really angry and tried to scare him off saying I'd call a cop, so he took off.
LDC_Translation_2: I felt considerably annoyed, scolded him and he then ran away when I gave him a threat of police.
LDC_Translation_3: I was enraged and I scolded him and threatened him with Police. At this, he ran away.
LDC_Translation_4: I got very angry- I shouted at him and threatened to call the police. Then he ran away.
Turk_Translation_1: I got really angry and when I told him and threaten him of a cop, he vanished from there.
Turk_Translation_2: I was furious, I cursed him and threatened him of the Police, then he ran away.
Turk_Translation_3: I got very angry and scolded him and warned him that I would call the soldiers, so he got very frightened.
Turk_Translation_4: I got very angry and said him a lot and thretened him of cops so he left the place immediately

Urdu: تواب یہ حالت ہوگئی ہے ہم مسلمانوں کی مانگنے کے لئے بھی گاڑیوں پرسوارہوکرساتھـ فیملی کے ساتھـ آتے ہیں اوردن بھرمیں کم ازکم دوتین ہزارکی دھاڑی لگاتے ہیں۔
LDC_Translation_1: The situation has become such that we Muslims take our family with us on a car to beg and make at least two to three thousand a day.
